title: Implement automated daily AI task generation and mission log updates at midnight

requirements.text: Implement a daily timer mechanism that triggers at midnight (00:00:00 local time) to automatically generate new AI-recommended daily tasks

quotes: perfect the ai to add tasks and mission log daily at 12am

acceptanceCriteria: Timer triggers precisely at midnight each day
AI task generation is invoked automatically without user interaction
New daily tasks replace or append to existing daily tasks based on current completion status

requirements.text: Create automated mission log entries at midnight that record daily activity summaries including completed tasks, missions accomplished, XP gained, and coins earned for that day
acceptanceCriteria: Mission log entry is created automatically at midnight
Log captures all relevant daily metrics: completed tasks count, completed missions count, total XP earned, total coins earned
Log entries are timestamped with the date they represent
Log entries are persistent and retrievable for historical review

requirements.text: Add a mission log history view in the frontend that displays all automated daily log entries with date, completed activities, and rewards earned
acceptanceCriteria: Mission log is accessible from the main navigation or dashboard
Log entries are displayed in reverse chronological order (newest first)
Each entry shows the date, completed tasks/missions count, and rewards (XP/coins)
UI follows existing design system with cyber/neon theme styling

requirements.text: Enhance the AI task generation logic to consider user's historical completion patterns, time of day preferences, and previously completed tasks to provide more personalized daily recommendations

quotes: perfect the ai to add tasks

acceptanceCriteria: AI uses taskCompletionLog data to analyze user patterns
Generated tasks vary based on user's completion success rates
Tasks avoid repetition of recently completed activities unless they are recurring by nature
Task difficulty scales appropriately with user level and stats

constraints: Use Motoko timers or heartbeat mechanism for scheduling midnight triggers
Do not modify existing authentication or profile management logic
Maintain compatibility with existing dailyTasks and taskCompletionLog data structures
Preserve all existing mission and task functionality
nonGoals: Email or push notifications for daily updates
